name: Driving Simulator
description:
Are you ready for a new challenge?
Driving Simulator is a game that allows you to test the coolest super cars, motorcycles, boats, etc. on the most challenging maps.

You can change your car as you like, for example: the color of the headlights, wheels, suspensions, lights, the color of the smoke, etc.

It all starts with the player in his house, and he has to go to the garage and choose the vehicle he wants to test. The garage can be improved in the future and you can add more vehicles (such as: boats, bicycles, tanks, planes, and more), then choose the map where he wants to test his favorite car.

Key Features:

- Over 15 vehicles to choose
- 6 Different maps
- Visual upgrades
- Free Roams / Minigames ( SOON )
- Damage System
- Realistic Physics
- POV Camera Drive
